pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Causal Inference with Possibly Invalid Instrumental Variables // Two stage curvature identification with machine learning for causal inference in settings when instrumental variable regression is not suitable because of potentially invalid instrumental variables. Based on Guo and Buehlmann (2022) "Two Stage Curvature Identification with Machine Learning: Causal Inference with Possibly Invalid Instrumental Variables" doi:10.48550/arXiv.2203.12808. The vignette is available in Carl, Emmenegger, Bhlmann and Guo (2025) "TSCI: Two Stage Curvature Identification for Causal Inference with Invalid Instruments in R" doi:10.18637/jss.v114.i07.
